page.title: 19MOUNTSORREL MINISTERS MEET
page.content: The rivalry which once existed between ministers and congregations of the different churches in Mountsorrel have more recently given way to fellowship and co-operation.In Mountsorrel the {two Anglican churches}share{one vicar and the{three Methodist}and{two {Baptist churches}of former times are {united in one congregation}of each.The Mountsorrel Christian Council includes lay people and meets to decide on an outline programme of{united events including,worship,children's work in summer,Lent meetings,outdoor witness, study and community care.The ministers meet regularly for prayer and detailed planning. The ministers of Mountsorrel and Rothley meet regularly for fellowship, prayer and sharing.This reduces the former isolation of ministers and encourages co-operation.
